active_incidents.title: Some users may not be able to configure 2FA

notes.body: We’ve identified the cause of this issue and we’re working on getting a fix out as soon as possible. We’ll be back once we have another update to share.

Some users may be having trouble setting up 2FA. 

In the meantime, we recommend using an incognito tab or a private browsing to set up 2FA while we continue actively looking into this issue.

We apologize for the inconvenience and we'll report back as more information becomes available.
